title: Cannot install League Client. Problem with "Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable (x64)" Error 1935
body:
I cannot for the life of me figure out what the problem with this installer is on my PC. To give the specifics on the error message that comes up, this is what happens when it starts to install. 

" Error 1935.An error occurred during the installation of assembly
'Microsoft.VC80.ATL.type="win32".version="8.0.50727.4053".publicKeyToken="1fc8b3b9a1e18e3b".processorArchitecture="amd64"
Please refer to Help and Support for more information. "

PS. Help and Support didn't answer a damn thing.

replies.body: This error usually happens with new PCs or reformats, and it means that your PC is missing a product to continue installation.  Usually a Windows update will fix this up, otherwise try [downloading the product manually](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  I hope that helps!
